Text:
A friend of mine has asked if you might be able to find Diane Whiteside novels? She mentioned something about a "Devil" series (??), and would really love to have any/all novels of hers you can provide.

I'm looking for any Wally Lamb books...

Thank you so much for all of your help and for all your hard work getting these torrents!

Cheers,
1mamabear

Thanks for the Chabon novels, again.  Stupidly, I forgot to ask for John Irving books.  Outside of Owen Meany and Twisted River, they are disturbingly absent. I already own paper copies of them all and really don't feel like spending close to a hundred bucks to get the e-book versions.  Thank You.

rufussondheim
you sure you have these titles correct?

John Irving books that are widely distributed are A Prayer for Owen Meany and Laqst Night in Twisted River.

Looking for The World According to Garp and The Cider House Rules mainly, but there are others that would be nice to have like Setting Free the Bears, The Hotel New Hampshire, The 158-Pound Marriage among others.
hey kk thanks for these your a star, I had never heard of james swain, loved all of these any chance of uploading the rest of his books, please.
